  mutate(
    year = as.integer(year),

```{r}
get_year <- function(year){
  y <- GET(
  url = "https://api.springernature.com/metadata/json?",
  query = list(
    api_key = "7cfebd7aed0050ae0776703f3a4fe121", 
    q = paste0("year: ", year)
  )
)
y <- y %>% content(type = "text") %>% fromJSON()

countries_y = y$facets$values[[5]] %>%
  mutate(year = year)

return(countries_y)
}
```
